summary: This talk will primarily cover PL/Python, allowing you to write procedural functions inside yoour databases.  Specifically we'll cover the basics of writing a function, touch upon some advanced usage like trigger functions, and then display some fun things that can be done when Python runs inside the database.
title: Postgres with Python inside and out: PL/Python
